title: Missions tracking rollback
body: I went to bed last night with 19 out of 20 missions for the msi event complete, but when I started playing today, the home screen says I've only completed 12, and on the missions tab says I've only completed 9. I thought this was just a display error, and did a quick bots game for my FWOTD and the counts didn't move.

replies.body:
Submit a ticket to player support and they'll be able to tell you the actual and if it's a visual bug :)

https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new
